name: Dell Technologies Inc.
summary: Dell Technologies Inc. is a global leader in technology solutions, offering a broad portfolio of products and services including PCs, servers, storage, networking, and cloud solutions for consumers, businesses, and public institutions. Founded in 1984 by Michael Dell, the company is headquartered in Round Rock, Texas, and ranks among the largest technology firms worldwide. Dell Technologies is publicly traded and consistently appears near the top of the Fortune 500 list.
